attributes.action: I would like the Pime Minster, to provide Free Homes, for people with a Learning Disability
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at the moment, as it stands a person with learning disabilities do not have the facility ta be assisted from a care environment into independent living, where-by a free home could be provided along with a support worker, to help them in the transistion!
